name: R15 M ABS(Indo)
description: The Yamaha R15 Connected is offered Petrol engine in the Indonesia.Its Petrol engine displacement is 155.09 cc.The R15 Connected has a length of 1990 mm the width of 725 mm, and a wheelbase of 1325 mm.

name: CBR 150R
description: The Honda CBR150R bike is currently powered by a DOHC-6 speed engine. Its maximum power is 16.87 Bhp @ 9000 RPM and the maximum torque is 14.4 Nm @ 7000 RPM.

name: GSX-R 150
description: The GSX-R150 will be powered by a 147.3 cc single-cylinder liquid-cooled engine that puts out a maximum power of 19 hp at 11,000 rpm and a peak torque of 14 Nm at 8500 rpm.

name: MT-15
description: Yamaha MT-15 Version 2.0 is powered by 155 cc engine.This MT-15 Version 2.0 engine generates a power of 18.4 PS @ 10000 rpm and a torque of 14.1 Nm @ 7500 rpm.

name: CB ex motion
description: This bike has 149 cc Engine which is Single Cylinder, DOHC, Liquid-Cooled, 4-Valve Engine. Its maximum power is 20.0 HP and the maximum torque is 14.50 NM. It uses a 6 speed Constant Mesh gear, and its maximum speed is 135 kilometres per hour.

name: GSX-S
description: Suzuki GSX-S150 is the naked version of GSX-R150 and uses the same engine. It generates maximum power of 18.90 Bhp @ 10,500 rpm and maximum torque of 14 NM @ 9000 rpm.Maximum Torque inlcuding 45 kmpl Mileage and 135 kmph Top Speed.
